modalText: Nutri Track helps you track your nutrition and achieve your health goals.
modalText2: You can earn 20XP per day by completing your daily objectives!
modalText3: Start tracking now to improve your nutrition and earn exciting levels
termsTitle: Terms of Service for Nutrition Track Application
termsContent: Welcome to Nutrition Track! By using our application, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use the application. We reserve the right to modify or update these terms at any time. It is your responsibility to review this page regularly for any changes. Your continued use of the application after any changes will constitute your acceptance of the new terms
termsContent2: Nutrition Track is an application designed to help you track your eating habits, monitor your calorie intake, macronutrients, and achieve your health and nutrition goals. The app allows you to track the foods you consume, view nutritional data, set goals, and analyze your progress.
termsContent3: You agree to use the application legally and in accordance with all applicable laws. You agree not to use the application in any abusive manner or to harm its functionality. You are responsible for the confidentiality of your personal information and for managing your account.
termsContent4: To access certain features of the application, you will need to create a user account. You must provide accurate and complete information during registration. It is your responsibility to maintain the confidentiality of your login credentials and prevent unauthorized access to your account.
termsContent5: The application collects certain personal data to function properly, such as information related to your nutrition, eating habits, and your user account details. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for more information on how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
termsContent6: The application may contain nutritional information, health tips, and suggestions, but this content is for informational purposes only. Always consult a healthcare professional before making decisions related to your nutrition, health, or well-being.
termsContent7: All intellectual property rights related to the content, features, and design of the application, including but not limited to logos, graphics, icons, and source code, are the exclusive property of [Company Name]. You agree not to reproduce, modify, distribute, or otherwise use any elements of the application without prior permission.
termsContent8: The application is provided 'as is', and we do not guarantee that it will be free from errors or bugs. We are not responsible for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the application, including data loss, calculation errors, or health-related issues.
termsContent9: We reserve the right to suspend, modify, or remove any features of the application at any time, without notice. You may terminate your account at any time by contacting us. We may also suspend or terminate your access to the application if you violate these Terms of Service.
termsContent10: The application may contain links to third-party websites. These links are provided for informational purposes only, and we are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of these websites.
termsContent11: By using this app, you agree that the laws of France will govern any disputes or issues arising from the use of this app. Although we operate in France, the data you provide may be stored and processed in various Google Cloud servers located in different regions, including outside of the European Union. We comply with all applicable data protection regulations, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), and take necessary steps to ensure that your data is handled securely and in accordance with these laws.
termsContent12: If you have any questions regarding these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
privacyContent1: Welcome to Nutrition Track! This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our application. By using Nutrition Track, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
privacyContent2:
We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:

- To provide and improve our App

- To personalize your experience

- To communicate with you, including sending promotional materials or customer service inquiries

- To analyze App usage and improve our services
privacyContent3:
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties unless we have your consent or are required by law. However, we may share your information with:

- Service Providers: Trusted third-party providers who assist us in operating our App or conducting business.

- Legal Requirements: If required by law or to protect the rights, property, or safety of our users or the public, we may disclose your information.
privacyContent4: We take reasonable measures to protect the security of your information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacyContent5:
- Access and Update Information: You can review and update your personal information through the App settings or by contacting us.

- Opt-out: You can opt out of promotional emails by clicking the unsubscribe link in the email or adjusting your preferences in the App.
privacyContent6: Our App is not intended for children under the age of 5. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected personal information from a child, please contact us, and we will take steps to delete such information.
privacyContent7: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.
privacyContent8: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

welcome_text:
Your nutrition journey starts today.

We‚Äôll support you daily in achieving your goals!
not_enought_data: Not enough data to display the chart.
not_enought_data_statictis: Not enough data to display the statistics.
text_enought: Please ensure you've provided sufficient activity or nutrition data for accurate insights.
nutriCalories: Daily calories recorded over the last 3 weeks
nutriRatio: Protein/carbohydrate/fat ratio recorded since your registration
goPremium: Upgrade to Premium and boost your nutrition
productText: Sorry, we couldn't find this product.
neutral1: When you‚Äôre feeling low, avoid sugary foods: they help at first but drain your energy later.
neutral2: Add some protein ‚Äî it helps stabilize your mood (eggs, fish, tofu...).
neutral3: No calories yet? That‚Äôs the perfect time to plan your first meal.
neutral4: If you haven‚Äôt eaten yet, don‚Äôt wait too long ‚Äî your body needs energy in the morning ‚òÄÔ∏è.
neutral5: A balanced breakfast is the key to starting your day right.
neutral6: Don‚Äôt forget to log what you‚Äôve eaten ‚Äî it helps me guide you.
neutral7: I‚Äôm here to follow your meals, let‚Äôs start little by little.
neutral8: Try to prepare something simple and nutritious today to start the day strong.
neutral9: Even if you‚Äôre not hungry, a light snack can help keep your energy steady.
motivated1: Drink at least 1.5 to 2 liters of water a day, especially if you‚Äôre active, to optimize digestion and toxin elimination.
motivated2: Stay well hydrated ‚Äî it helps maintain that healthy balance.
motivated3: Keep distributing your calories between proteins, complex carbs, and healthy fats (like avocados, nuts, or olive oil) to support your energy and muscles.
motivated4: Great management today ‚Äî keep the rhythm steady and pressure-free to reach your goals.
motivated5: You can be proud, it‚Äôs days like this that build lasting results. Keep it up!
motivated6: Add colorful vegetables (broccoli, carrots, spinach) to boost your vitamins and minerals without exceeding your calorie goal.
motivated7: Don‚Äôt forget healthy fats (avocado, nuts, olive oil) ‚Äî they help absorb vitamins and support hormonal balance.
motivated8: Remember to vary your protein sources (chicken, fish, tofu, legumes) for a complete amino acid profile.
motivated9: Keep up that great energy ‚Äî it‚Äôs the engine of your progress!
motivated10: If you‚Äôre feeling tired, adjust slightly with a healthy snack (a handful of almonds or plain yogurt) within your calorie limits.
motivated11: Good sleep (7‚Äì8 hours) helps your metabolism use calories efficiently.
motivated12: Once a week, treat yourself to a small pleasure (like a piece of dark chocolate) to stay motivated without slipping.
motivated13: Combine cardio (30 min, 3‚Äì4 times/week) and strength training (2‚Äì3 times/week) to increase your resting energy expenditure.
motivated14: Add chili, ginger, green tea, or coffee (in moderation) to stimulate calorie burning.
motivated15: Excessive calorie restriction slows metabolism ‚Äî keep a moderate deficit if you aim to lose weight.
angry1: Overeating happens ‚Äî it‚Äôs not the end of the world. Get back to your normal rhythm at your next meal.
angry2: A 20‚Äì30 minute walk can burn some of those extra calories and help you feel lighter.
angry3: Go for a vegetable soup or a salad with lean protein (chicken, fish) to rebalance without depriving yourself.
angry4: Too much of a calorie deficit slows your metabolism ‚Äî keep a reasonable balance.
angry5: Plan 3 meals and 1‚Äì2 snacks per day to avoid extreme hunger that leads to overeating.
angry6: Eat vegetables, fruits, and whole grains to stay full for longer.
angry7: Eat without screens (TV, phone) so you can focus on your satiety signals.
angry8: Keep healthy options on hand (dried fruits, plain yogurt) to resist impulsive cravings.
angry9: Practice breathing exercises or walking to reduce emotional snacking.
angry10: Getting 7‚Äì8 hours of sleep helps regulate hunger hormones (ghrelin and leptin).
angry11: You clearly went over your calories today üò°! No worries ‚Äî we‚Äôll balance it out tomorrow with lighter, fiber-rich meals ü•¶.
angry12: Watch your salt and sugar intake tomorrow ‚Äî they retain water and contribute to fatigue.
angry13: Try to limit sugary and fatty foods at your next meal ‚Äî your body will thank you.
happy1: Reward yourself with a small healthy treat, like a piece of dark chocolate or a fruit smoothie ‚Äî well deserved!
happy2: Drink some infused water (lemon, mint) to celebrate without extra calories.
happy3: Plan your next goal with a balanced meal tomorrow to stay consistent.
happy4: Note your success or share it with someone ‚Äî it boosts your motivation.
happy5: A piece of dark chocolate (70% or more, 1-2g) or a handful of berries (raspberries, blueberries) to satisfy cravings without overdoing it.
happy6: Draw, read, or listen to your favorite music ‚Äî rewards that lift your mood without calorie impact.
planText: You have joined the Premium club !

faq_add_food.question: How to add a food item?
faq_add_food.answer: Select the desired day, then press the '+' button to add a new food item. Then choose the meal to associate the food with.

faq_avatar.question: Why can't I change my avatar?
faq_avatar.answer: Avatar customization is a feature reserved for Premium users. Subscribe to unlock this option.

faq_goal_icon.question: What does the goal üéØ icon mean?
faq_goal_icon.answer: The üéØ icon indicates that your daily nutritional goal has been adjusted. Your macronutrient distribution has been modified to increase or decrease your caloric intake relative to your daily goal.

faq_update_weight.question: Why should I update my weight regularly?
faq_update_weight.answer: Regularly updating your weight ensures more accurate tracking of your progress and proper adjustment of nutritional goals. An up-to-date weight guarantees reliable calculations for your caloric and macronutrient needs.

faq_mascot_bmi.question: Why does the mascot have the same BMI as me?
faq_mascot_bmi.answer: The mascot reflects your BMI (Body Mass Index) to visually represent your progress. It evolves based on your personal data, making tracking more intuitive and motivating.

faq_xp.question: I didn't gain experience after completing my daily goals, why?
faq_xp.answer: Experience gain is limited to 20 XP per day for the current day. Completing goals for a past day does not grant experience. Make sure today's caloric intake matches the defined goal to earn experience; it is added automatically once conditions are met.

faq_modify_food.question: Can I modify an already added food?
faq_modify_food.answer: Modifying an already added food is not yet available. To make changes, delete the food and add it again with the desired values.

faq_gram_precision.question: Why can't I add food with gram precision?
faq_gram_precision.answer: Adding foods with gram precision is a Premium feature. Without a subscription, quantities are proposed as predefined portions.

faq_custom_food.question: Can I create my own custom foods?
faq_custom_food.answer: Creating custom foods is exclusively for Premium subscribers. This feature allows you to add your own foods with their exact nutritional values.

faq_food_database.question: Why are some foods not available in the database?
faq_food_database.answer: The nutritional database is regularly updated. Some specific or local foods may not be listed yet. Premium users can create custom foods in this case.

faq_data_saved.question: Are my data saved?
faq_data_saved.answer: Yes. All your data is securely saved, ensuring confidentiality and protection.

faq_delete_food.question: Can I delete a food added by mistake?
faq_delete_food.answer: Yes. You can delete a food at any time by removing it from the meal it was added to.

faq_modify_goals.question: Can I modify my nutritional goals?
faq_modify_goals.answer: Yes. You can modify your nutritional goals anytime from settings. Changes will immediately impact your daily targets and macronutrient tracking.

faq_technical_issue.question: I have a technical problem, what should I do?
faq_technical_issue.answer: Contact our support via the 'Contact support' section in the app settings to get help.
